    • Method Detail

      • initializeGame

        public void initializeGame(int gameID,
                           java.lang.String startInfo)
        Parameters:
        startInfo - = string of information necessary to start the game
        pre
        gameID matches an existing game. Players are in the game
        post
        GameManager will walk players through starting 2 turns and structure placement for gameInit

      • endGame

        public void endGame(int gameID)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        pre
        gameID matches an existing game
        post
        Game will be terminated. Players will be evicted from game if still inside.

      • createGame

        public void createGame()
        pre
        The server is running. Method triggered by a request from a successfully logged in user.
        post
        Game is added to the list of games on server

      • listGames

        public java.util.ArrayList<Game> listGames()
        pre
        Server is running
        post
        If games exists, all existing games will be listed. Otherwise a message will display "No games found"

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(int gameID)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        pre
        gameID matches an existing Game
        post
        Player will join a game

      • gameHasFourPlayers

        public boolean gameHasFourPlayers(int gameID)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        pre
        gameID matches an existing Game
        post
        returns boolean value for whether game has 4 players or not

      • placeRoad

        public void placeRoad(int gameID,
                      EdgeLocation edge)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        edge - = valid edge location where road should be placed
        pre
        gameID matches existing game. Edge Locations is a valid location in this game's map
        post
        adds a road to the requested edge in the game

      • placeSettlement

        public void placeSettlement(int gameID,
                            HexLocation h,
                            VertexLocation v)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        hex - = hex used to find the normalized vertex location where settlement should be placed
        vertex - = vertex where the settlement should be placed
        pre
        gameID matches existing game. Hex and VertexLocations are valid location in this game's map.
        post

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice(int gameID)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        pre
        gameId matches an existing game. It's the start of a player's turn
        post
        diceRollEvents from the MapManager are triggered.

      • buy

        public boolean buy(int gameID,
                   java.lang.String card)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        card - = requested card type
        pre
        gameId matches an existing game. Card is a valid cardType
        post
        Success = Cards will be transferred between current player bank and game bank.

      • build

        public boolean build(int gameID,
                     java.lang.String object)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        object - = structure type
        pre
        gameID matches an existing game. object matches a valid structure
        post
        Success = Structure built, player victory point incremented, structure count decremented.

      • trade

        public boolean trade(int gameID,
                     int senderID,
                     int receiverID,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Card> offer,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Card> request)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        senderID - = unique ID of the current player
        receiverID - = unique ID of the trade recipient (game's bankID if maritime trade)
        offer - = List of cards being offered by current player
        request - = List of cards requested from the trade recipient
        pre
        gameID is valid. Sender and receiver are valid. Sender has all cards in the offer available
        post
        Failure = Receiver doesn't have the requested cards; Success = cards are transferred between the two player's banks.

      • useCard

        public boolean useCard(int gameID,
                       Card c)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        card - = card being used.
        pre
        Card exists in the player's hand
        post
        Card will be returned to game's bank (unless it's a development card. Then it will be moved to another part of the player's bank) Card effect will be carried out.

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn(int gameID)
        Parameters:
        gameID - = unique ID of a game in the server's games list
        pre
        gameID exists. Method only called after other turn-operations are all completed (No trades ongoing, cards being played, etc)
        post
        The current player pointer will move to the next player. All cards in all player's hands will be marked as usable.
